Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a baking sheet with olive oil.
Combine flour, cornmeal, Italian seasoning, salt, and paprika in one wide, shallow bowl. Pour milk into another wide, shallow bowl.
Bread your eggplant slices by dipping them in milk and coating them with the flour mixture. Place the breaded slices on the prepared baking sheet and brush the tops with olive oil.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, then flip the eggplant slices and continue baking until they start to brown, for an additional 15 to 20 minutes.
This recipe provides the complete nutritional information for all the breading ingredients used, considering that the actual consumption of the breading may vary.
